name: The Nowhere (Ode)
description:
An island with an abandoned campsite has been found off the coast of [REDACTED]. You have been invited by a pen pal to investigate said island.

Controls:

  • Move using WASD
  • Open menu with Esc/B
  • Press F to toggle your lantern once you have obtained it
  • Press E to interact

This game is playable on browsers, but the performance may not be optimal. You can also download the Windows version of the game below.
